fields.name: Biomine search (plants)
fields.description: Calls the Biomine search engine (for plant data, updated version at JSI).

fields.name: Database
fields.description: Name of the database to use

fields.name: Biomine visualizer (js)
fields.description: Graph visualization for Biomine in Javascript.

fields.name: Graph
fields.description: Graph as a string in Biomine .bmg format

fields.name: Filtered gene ranks
fields.description: Filtered ordered list of pairs (geneID, rank)

fields.name: Filtered fold change values
fields.description: Filtered ordered list of pairs (geneID, logFC)

fields.name: Fold change gene filter
fields.description: Filters the genes according to FC threshold.

fields.name: Hierarchical clustering
fields.description: Performs hierarchical clustering using the selected linkage.

fields.name: Map miRNA to gene (targetscan)
fields.description: Maps a the input list of ranked miRNA into a ranked list of genes using the Targetscan database.

fields.name: Read microarray data from file
fields.description: Reads a csv of gene expression data in SegMine specific format into an Orange data table.

fields.name: Fold change: Input data format
fields.description: Specifies whether the input data is linear or log2 transformed (needed for fold change computation).

fields.name: Orange data table with class
fields.description: Orange data table where columns are genes and rows are measurements. The class attribute indicates whether the measurement belongs to the control or the treatment group.

fields.name: Fold change
fields.description: sorted list of pairs (gene, fold change)

fields.name: Resolve STU gene names
fields.description: Maps known probe STU gene names into GoMapMan/rep names

fields.name: Cutoff
fields.description: Cutoff threshold for DE/ non-DE genes

fields.name: Cutoff
fields.description: Cutoff threshold for DE/ non-DE genes

fields.name: Cutoff
fields.description: Cutoff threshold for DE/ non-DE genes

fields.name: SEGS rules as Orange table
fields.description: Transform SEGS rules into an Orange ExampleTable. Useful for e.g., clustering.

fields.name: SEGS rules
fields.description: Rules as returned by the SEGS widget

fields.name: Gene table
fields.description: Rules as rows, their genes as columns.

fields.name: Term table
fields.description: Rules as rows, their terms as columns.

fields.name: Select Biomine database
fields.description: Calls the API of the new Biomine service to get the list of available databases.

fields.name: Select hierarchical cluster
fields.description: A non-interactive variant of Hierarchical clustering for SegMine.

fields.name: T-test gene filter
fields.description: Filters the genes according to t-test p-value threshold.

fields.name: Union and intersection of attributes for SegMine rule table
fields.description: Returns a set of strings computed as a union and intersection of all attributes of a SegMine rule table (genes or terms).
